text: Bills fire Sean McDermott - NBC Sports
fullText: The Bills dismissed McDermott after Saturday's loss to the Broncos.

text: Yes, The Leaked ‘Marathon’ Preorder And Release Date Is Real - Forbes
fullText: Marathon preorders will be live tomorrow, and the leaked release date the new trailer has shown is in fact real.

text: Australian Open 2026 results: Novak Djokovic beats Pedro Martinez for 100th win at tournament - BBC
fullText: Novak Djokovic delivers a serving masterclass in his 100th Australian Open victory - a straight-set first-round win over Spain's Pedro Martinez.

text: An Explosion Rocks ‘GTA 6’ Developer Rockstar North, Reportedly An Accident - Forbes
fullText: An explosion and ensuing fire have damaged Rockstar North, but the event seems to have been unintentional, according to the information we have.

text: Blast at a hotel in downtown Kabul leaves multiple casualties, officials say - ABC News
fullText: An explosion at a hotel in downtown Kabul has left several people dead and injured, according to officials

text: Column | As Trump goes to Davos, the world faces a ‘new reality’ - The Washington Post
fullText: President Donald Trump is preparing to address a gathering of global elites in Switzerland while appearing to be at open war with paradigms they have long defended.

text: Stellantis stock off 43% as Jeep maker turns five, executes turnaround - CNBC
fullText: Stellantis shares were largely up – as high as 93% in March 2024 – until reporting troubling financial results that year amid cost-cutting efforts and EVs.

text: Maye Day! Rebooted New England Closes In on Surprise Super Bowl Return - The Wall Street Journal
fullText: A serious test versus top-seeded Denver awaits—but against a suddenly promoted backup quarterback

text: Meet the 1894 Yale Bulldogs, the first college football team to go 16-0 - ESPN
fullText: Indiana could complete a 16-0 season with a national championship win over Miami on Monday night. But it won't be the first team to accomplish the feat.

text: Sun erupts with powerful X-class flare as huge CME races toward Earth, impact possible within 24 hours - Space
fullText: Aurora alert! The colossal solar storm could impact and trigger impressive northern lights.

text: Prince Harry vs. the Daily Mail: The British privacy trial starts - CNN
fullText: Prince Harry arrived at London’s High Court on Monday as he takes on the publisher of the Daily Mail over historical unlawful information gathering.

text: IMF warns of trade tension risk to global growth - BBC
fullText: Trade tensions and a reversal in the AI boom are among the main risks to global economic growth, the IMF says.

text: Trump has rolled out many of the Project 2025 policies he once claimed ignorance about - NPR
fullText: Some of the 2025 policies that have been implemented include cracking down on immigration and dismantling the Department of Education.

text: China hits growth goal after exports defy US tariffs - BBC
fullText: Official figures suggest China's economy hit its target but analysts have cast doubt on the data.

text: The current US political climate is spurring a ‘reclaim’ and rallying on the MLK holiday - AP News
fullText: As communities across the country prepare Monday to host parades, panels and service projects for the 40th anniversary of when the federal government officially began observing Martin Luther King Jr. Day, the current political climate has left some feeling mo…

text: DOJ vows to press charges after activists disrupt church where Minnesota ICE official is a pastor - CNN
fullText: The US Department of Justice said Sunday it is investigating a group of protesters in Minnesota who disrupted services at a church where a local official with US Immigration and Customs Enforcement apparently serves as a pastor.

text: Man detained in Minneapolis dies in ICE custody in Texas - MPR News
fullText: A man arrested by immigration officials in Minneapolis died in federal detention in Texas.

text: EXCLUSIVE: Xbox Cloud Gaming is getting ad-supported access VERY soon - Windows Central
fullText: Users have been noticing that Xbox Cloud Gaming has begun referencing "ad support" while launching games.

text: Hack disrupts Iranian state TV, airs Reza Pahlavi statement - The Jerusalem Post
fullText: Anti-regime activists hacked Iran’s Badr satellite, briefly taking over state TV broadcasts to air protest messages and appeals by Reza Pahlavi, according to Iran International and Manoto News.

text: Why is flu season so bad this year? - Live Science
fullText: Flu season in the U.S. is particularly bad this year, and a new branch of the flu family tree may be to blame.
